main event: Sightings of unidentified flying objects in San Antonio, Texas on 6 November 1954.
interesting points: One reported object was a white saucer-like shape suspended in the air for 20 to 30 seconds before disappearing., A civilian pilot reported seeing a round object approximately 50 feet in diameter., Multiple witnesses, including a student pilot and instructor, observed a fast-moving and maneuverable oblong object., Investigations suggested a nearby H-13 helicopter could explain some sightings., Insufficient data led to concluding some reports may involve natural phenomena.
sighted object: one round saucer-like white object and one oblong, fast-moving object
witness description: civilians including pilots and an Air Force officer
